question: How Can I Be Sure That My Money Is Safe?
body: Electrnic Payments will be securely processed by Stripe. Cash payments will be collected by fully veted individuals, the Soll Leaders.

question: Who Will Be Managing The Funds?
body: Funds from each group will be securely managed by the Soll Core Group, and redistributed to participants accordingly. Please see the fund redistribution section.

question: What If A Participant Quits?
body:
The Soll System is well equipped to handle situations where a participant cannot continue to make contributions. The system is designed such that even if a participant quits after receiving their contribution, no one suffers any loss, since this participant would have already paid all their dues up to that point in time. 
If a participant decides to quit before receiving their contribution, the participant will be refunded and the void will be appropriately filled.

question: Can I Participate In More Than One Groups At A Time?
body: At this time, multiple group participations are not supported.
